label: 院
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: a retired monarch, which term probably derived from the term koin, meaning the retired monarch’s retirement place. From the tenth century there were also royal ladies (nyôin) whose status was equivalent to that of a retired monarch. [後院] [女院]
